Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Flow.Publisher<ModelUpdate>
public class Player extends Object implements Flow.Publisher<ModelUpdate>
This class represent one of the game's player.

    • Player

      public Player(String nickname, TowerColor color, GameMode mode)
      Creates a Player object.
      Parameters:
      nickname - Player's name.
      color - Color of the player's towers.
      mode - Mode of the game the player is in.

    • Player

      public Player(String nickname, SchoolBoard board) throws NullPointerException
      Creates a Player object from a school board.
      Parameters:
      nickname - Player's name.
      board - School board from where to get the towers color and game board.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException

  • Method Details

    • selectCard

      public void selectCard(int turnOrder) throws NoSuchAssistantCardException
      Method to select an AssistantCard during the planning phase.
      Parameters:
      turnOrder - The number of turn of the card.
      Throws:
      NoSuchAssistantCardException - if the player hasn't got the selected card.

    • notifySubscriber

      public void notifySubscriber()
      Notifies the subscribers.

    • addCard

      public void addCard(AssistantCard card) throws NullPointerException
      Method to add an AssistantCard to the player.
      Parameters:
      card - The card to be added.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - Thrown if the card is null.

    • removeCard

      public void removeCard(int turnOrder) throws NoSuchAssistantCardException, EndGameException
      Method to remove an AssistantCard from the player's list of cards.
      Parameters:
      turnOrder - The number of turn of the card.
      Throws:
      NoSuchAssistantCardException - If the player doesn't have the selected card.
      EndGameException - If the last card is removed.

    • removeSelectedCard

      public void removeSelectedCard()
      Removes the currently selected card.
